name: Predețeanu & Partners
goal: Predețeanu & Partners offers strategic communication services in the fields of public affairs and public relations. The company is built around a core of specialists with high expertise in the field of reputation management. The company is aiming to support the development of a transparent and constructive dialogue of the clients with various types of institutions at the level of authorities, diplomats, media representatives and business environment.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Audiovisual and Media, Budget, Climate Action, Communication, Competition, Consumer Affairs, Culture, Customs, Development, Economic and Financial Affairs, Education, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Enterprise, Environment, External Relations, Financial Stability, Financial Services and Capital Markets Union , Food Safety, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, General and Institutional Affairs, Home Affairs, Information Society, Internal Market, Public Health, Regional Policy, Research and Technology, Taxation, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives: Monitoring of the WEEE Directive 2012/19/EU transposition in the national legislation.
customers: Samsung Electronics Romania,Asociatia Romana pentru Reciclare - RoRec,Kronospan
